phrases: That peddler said it was just behind that mountain pass.
Bro's picked up a weird habit too.
Yeah, we should have gotten one if it was going to be this far.
I am not walking any further even if that blacksmith is not here.
If not here, we walk more.
I know, I did not really mean that.
I think he said the swordmaker's name was Munetsuna.
All right, let us go bro.
Until the sun burnt skin ruptures
There is a light in the depths of the seething darkness
Confirming each other's voices in the distance
As if to stroke with wet fingertips
I would like to touch you one day
There is a light in the depths of the darkness
Confirming each other's voices in the distance
As if to stroke with wet fingertips
I would like to touch you one day
He lives on the outskirts of the village.
But you are not going to ask him to forge a sword, are you?
But he is a really skilled craftsman, right?
Nah, he is nothing of the sort.
Hey, that is not what the peddler told us.
He forged that hatchet for me, but I am not impressed at all.
And his daughter, Okowa, is really ugly and has a bad personality.
I have never liked them too much.
Here to complain about my papa again?
We were traveling and heard that your papa forged great swords.
Yeah, my papa's the best swordmaker in the land.
The people here always lie like that.
But they still come to Papa for help.
Then can he reforge these for us?
Wow, they have really been through a lot.
Bro, I told you not to do that!
He might get mad if we disturb him.
First impressions are really important, you know.
Hey, look at that funny thing.
He wants you to reforge some swords.
He probably wants to marry me, too.
What have you killed with them?
We have never purified a sword before.
You do not need to know.
Bishamon, the guardian god looks over this temple.
Papa and everyone else at the village pray to it.
That is because it is blowing on the embers.
It is been passed down for generations in our family to keep away misfortune.
The Hyottoko god, blowing on embers huh.
Nobody blows on embers like this.
What the heck are you doing, bro?
This is not the time to fool around.
That Munetsuna guy said he would bring the swords here when they are done.
So let us get some rest till then.
It is not going to cost us as much as I thought, so we can just relax here.
I thought I heard you say you did not need them.
What the heck do you mean?
You need them to get your body back.
I thought you might be hungry, so I made this.
The master of the house gets to eat first.
Hey, bro and I are on a really important journey right now.
Once the swords are done, we are leaving.
I am prepared to go with you.
I am the only one who can handle it.
I am the daughter of the land's best swordmaker.
Dang it, you tell her bro.
That you cannot be with Okowa.
Hey, you should not joke around like that.
And the rest of your body?
Do not have to be together anymore.
Mr. Hyaku, I do not mind, really.
I do not need Dororo with me.
You big ole dummy idiot jerk!
I am really glad that you and Okowa are getting together!
You two were meant for each other!
Thank you, I am so happy.
Little Dororo, crying for us like that.
I do not care about you anymore.
Only bad things to come now.
I told the villagers that I was going to marry you, and now look at all this.
They say wedding attire makes a girl glow.
I will make one to make you look shabby.
I would been hoping you would hurry up and get married.
Hope you have a good wedding.
It means you and I are going to be husband and wife.
I thought the earlier the better, so I set it for tomorrow.
I congratulate you from the bottom of my heart!
No matter what anyone might say,
you are going to be happy together.
Gosh dang it, what is happened to me?
All head over heels for Okowa.
You like her so much, huh?
You have it your way, and I will have it mine.
You put this lovely kimono to waste.
Mr. Hyaku, you are not supposed to see yet.
If he does not need the swords, I will throw them away.
I really am going to do it.
I have just been to purify it.
What were you going to do with that one?
So that is why you wanted to throw them away.
Bro suddenly lost interest in the journey.
And I say things I do not mean.
I do not know what to do now.
Bro does not understand how I feel at all.
He is helped me out a whole bunch ever since we met.
So I would made up my mind to help him get through rough times.
How can he quit the journey now?
You just came for me a few days ago.
Are not you going to Okowa's wedding?
Nothing is more important to a swordmaker than making swords.
So I do not like swords made for killing.
I hate people killing people, too.
My ideal is to make a sword that makes fighting cease.
A sword that makes the enemy see that they are no match and give up.
I might not live to see it happen.
I just know I should not use my powers for the wrong because.
I have to stay by bro's side.
I have been saying what I really mean, have not I?
Why am I okay when I am here?
Wait, since when have I been talking in opposites?
Since when has he been weird?
-Come on, we have to go to the temple.
The villagers will hold a celebration for us afterwards.
They can come when we get back from the temple.
Was it you that did all this?
That ghoul is probably what made us act weird.
Mr. Hyaku, what are you doing?
You are going to kill Dororo, stop!
I am sorry I doubted you.
Who would have thought it was real.
So it was all this ghoul's fault.
Legend has it there was once an Amanojaku that worked mischief in the village.
So we really were protected by the Hyottoko gods.
But when did it get out?
Now then, Mr. Hyaku and Dororo are back to being friends again.
So let us get on with the wedding...
Wait, if everyone was speaking in opposites because of the ghoul...
Dororo and Mr. Hyaku were too, and...
So you see, it is not Mr. Hyaku's fault.
Okowa, you do not need to marry him anyway.
I could not tell you how I felt all this time.
But I promise to make you happier than grouchy face here.
I told you, Papa's the best swordmaker in the land.
They have been through harsh fates no normal human could even imagine.
And it is not over for them yet.
There was no place for you by his side to begin with.
Dealing with ghouls like that all the time.
-Do not rub your head on people anymore.
Let us get going then, bro.
I am the only one who can handle this journey with you.
The distorted shape of the heart
Even from the path of evil
We do not even recognize the pain
As we peel back the skin
We are forever tormented by our stupidity
But if the dawn never comes
You will be able to love this accursed world
Now that we carry the world on our shoulders
It is time to take it back
